Name: Croppy Boy
About the game: Sandbox multiplayer farming simulation with no rules. Online & Offline play. This free version unlocks the Peasant character, which is slower and has less stamina, reduced starting gold and generally poorer stats to reflect his inferior nature. Game Modes SANDBOX: free play mode with no rules FESTIVAL: competitive 4 player elimination mode Discord Support / Chat:
